issue.title: [Python] DictionaryType should give access to index type and dictionary array
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2513](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2513). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, only `ordered` is mapped from C Type to Python, but index type and dictionary array are not accessible from Python.
